name: Shooting Range - Aim & Fire at the Target InterNational Championship
name_original: Shooting Range - Aim & Fire at the Target InterNational Championship
description:
A supreme test of accuracy is now available on mobile. Choose your weapon and see if you can qualify for the next Olympics or championship. Win this sporting event and be as accurate as you can. Targets are not moving, but clay pigeons are! Pull the trigger at the right time!

Pick one of three weapons: Rifle, Pistol or Shotgun. With the first two by shooting as close to the bulls-eye as you can. While skeet shooting with the shotgun, you have to fire at the flying clay targets. Let’s see in which firearm category you are the best and represent your country by choosing your national flag!

Shooting is a true test of accuracy and demands intellectual and psychological skill rather than physical strength, with competitions won and lost by a matter of millimeters.
publishers: NS WEB DEVELOPMENT DOO NOVI SAD
